title: Turn Me On
description: He has an appetite for her. And he’ll savour every delicious taste...Food journalist Faye Curry has lost her appetite for food, relationships, and even sex. Then she’s sent to London to interview sexy celebrity chef Gregor Wright. That lean body, those glacier-blue eyes...mmm. Sleeping with him is strictly forbidden – and yet she can’t resist being deliciously devoured by him. And worse, Faye’s starting to long for the one thing not on the menu – Gregor’s heart.Mills & Boon Dare – Sensual love stories with smart, sassy heroines and the sexiest men alive!
author: Dylan Rose
